scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Robinson Brothers Store Ledger contains monthly entries from December 1922 to December 1927 for this store in eastern Wythe County that records expenses and credits for sundries, payroll, and merchandise. Businesses include many in Wythe County and Pulaski County and beyond including Wythe Grocery Company, Roanoke Coffee and Spice, Strother Drug Company, Foote and Johnston, Hechts Bakery, Pulaski Feed and Supply, and Roanoke Hardware Company. The ledger numbers 300 pages of which pages 1 to 48 contain writing; the rest of the pages are blank.
